alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Essex; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Essex, southeastern Worcester, Norfolk, Suffolk, southeastern Middlesex, Plymouth, Bristol, eastern Newport and northeastern Providence Counties with heavy rainfall through 215 PM EDT... At 1249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Franklin to Dighton to near Tiverton. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, New Bedford, Brockton, Quincy, Lynn, Fall River, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Pawtucket, Framingham, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Plymouth, Medford, Taunton, Weymouth and Revere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. These storms may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
